content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Area (Position x=0-4, y=0)
Consists of two stone furnaces for smelting iron:
- Furnace 1 at Position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
- Furnace 2 at Position(x=2.0, y=0.0)

###Copper Smelting Area (Position x=4, y=4)
Single stone furnace for smelting copper:
- Furnace at Position(x=4.0, y=4.0)

###Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Assembly line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at Position(x=6.5, y=11.5)
- Burner inserter at Position(x=7.5, y=11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at Position(x=9.5, y=11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at Position(x=11.5, y=11.5) moving products to output chest
- Output wooden chest at Position(x=12.5, y=11.5) storing finished electronic circuits

###Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to 0, y=22.5-28.5)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at Position(x=-9.5, y=24.5)
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at Position(x=-7.0, y=24.5)
- Steam engine at Position(x=-2.5, y=24.5)
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to access non-existent lab entity
- Ensure lab entity exists at specified position (x=0.5, y=28.5) before attempting to access it
- Verify entity positions and types before making API calls

### Entity status errors
- Monitor furnace ingredient levels to avoid NO_INGREDIENTS status
- Keep furnaces supplied with both fuel and raw materials
- Check assembler ingredient requirements before attempting production

### Resource management
- Maintain adequate coal supplies for burner inserters and boilers
- Monitor input/output chest contents to prevent production bottlenecks
